CustomField.description: Formual to derive a total complexity score for prospective projects. Can be used to assess project load, relationships between complexity and project timelines, and to assess if we have priced our modules appropriately
CustomField.formula: 1 + Pscore_Device_Connectivity__c + Pscore_Device_Interfacing__c + Pscore_Hospitals__c + Pscore_Interface__c + Pscore_Lifecyle__c + Pscore_Migration_Platform_Change__c + PScore_Modules__c + Pscore_New_Installation__c + Pscore_Non_Standard__c + Pscore_Ownership__c + PScore_Test_System__c
CustomField.label: *Total Project Complexity Score
